info.name: NS Record Detection
author: pdteam
info.description: An NS record was detected. An NS record delegates a subdomain to a set of name servers.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 52973
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;aplus.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 NS
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 52973
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 2, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 512

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;aplus.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 NS

;; ANSWER SECTION:
aplus.beta.gouv.fr.	300	IN	NS	dns2.alwaysdata.com.
aplus.beta.gouv.fr.	300	IN	NS	dns1.alwaysdata.com.

info.name: CAA Record
author: pdteam
info.description: A CAA record was discovered. A CAA record is used to specify which certificate authorities (CAs) are allowed to issue certificates for a domain.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 46715
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;aplus.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 CAA
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 46715
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 1, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 1232

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;aplus.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 CAA

;; AUTHORITY SECTION:
aplus.beta.gouv.fr.	300	IN	SOA	dns1.alwaysdata.com. hostmaster.alwaysdata.com. 1686142552 3600 900 1209600 300

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 9590
;; flags: rd ad; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;_dmarc.aplus.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 TXT
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 9590
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 1, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 512

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;_dmarc.aplus.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 TXT

;; ANSWER SECTION:
_dmarc.aplus.beta.gouv.fr.	300	IN	TXT	"v=DMARC1; p=none; pct=100; rua=mailto:re+ypyaqgmnvdz@dmarc.postmarkapp.com; sp=none; aspf=r;"

info.name: DNS TXT Record Detected
author: pdteam
info.description: A DNS TXT record was detected. The TXT record lets a domain admin leave notes on a DNS server.

extracted-results: "v=spf1 include:spf.mailjet.com include:sendgrid.net include:_spf.alwaysdata.com include:spf.tipimail.com include:spf.sendinblue.com mx ~all"
request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 40288
;; flags: rd ad; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;aplus.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 TXT
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 40288
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 2, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 1232

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;aplus.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 TXT

;; ANSWER SECTION:
aplus.beta.gouv.fr.	300	IN	TXT	"v=spf1 include:spf.mailjet.com include:sendgrid.net include:_spf.alwaysdata.com include:spf.tipimail.com include:spf.sendinblue.com mx ~all"
aplus.beta.gouv.fr.	300	IN	TXT	"sendinblue-code:c24c9950139318527a15eecce3c91ca3"

info.name: MX Record Detection
author: pdteam
info.description: An MX record was detected. MX records direct emails to a mail exchange server.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 18597
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;aplus.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 MX
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 18597
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 2, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 512

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;aplus.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 MX

;; ANSWER SECTION:
aplus.beta.gouv.fr.	300	IN	MX	20 mx2.alwaysdata.com.
aplus.beta.gouv.fr.	300	IN	MX	10 mx1.alwaysdata.com.

info.name: HttpOnly Cookie - Detect
author: mr. bobo hp
info.description: Checks whether cookies in the HTTP response contain the HttpOnly attribute. If the HttpOnly flag is set, it means that the cookie is HTTP-only

request:
GET / HTTP/1.1
Host: aplus.beta.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Accept-Encoding: gzip
response:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK Connection: close Content-Length: 19893 Content-Security-Policy: img-src 'self' data: stats.data.gouv.fr; connect-src 'self' https://stats.data.gouv.fr; form-action 'self'; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' stats.data.gouv.fr; frame-src 'self' *.aplus.beta.gouv.fr https://www.dailymotion.com; object-src 'none'; default-src 'none'; base-uri 'none'; script-src 'self' stats.data.gouv.fr; font-src 'self'; frame-ancestors 'self' Content-Type: text/html; charset=UTF-8 Date: Sun, 05 Nov 2023 02:13:03 GMT Referrer-Policy: origin-when-cross-origin, strict-origin-when-cross-origin Set-Cookie: PLAY_SESSION=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJkYXRhIjp7ImNzcmZUb2tlbiI6ImI2MWJkNmYyZjNiNzQzNmQ5NTg4M2I2ZTgzYzVmZDM3ODY1MDRlMDQtMTY5OTE1MDM4MzczNy1hMTMyNjllNTU5M2ZkZGFkYzRkZWE5ZWEifSwiZXhwIjoxNzAxNzQyMzgzLCJuYmYiOjE2OTkxNTAzODMsImlhdCI6MTY5OTE1MDM4M30.FB568DDDMvLUZhmse0oIr91ya1pMkzN_msf85N8cFM8; Max-Age=2592000; Expires=Tue, 05 Dec 2023 02:13:03 GMT; SameSite=Lax; Path=/; Secure; HTTPOnly Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=15724800; includeSubDomains X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff X-Frame-Options: DENY X-Permitted-Cross-Domain-Policies: master-only X-Xss-Protection: 1; mode=block Administration+

Administration +

Qu'est-ce que c'est ?

keyboard_arrow_down

Objectif : coopérer pour résoudre les blocages complexes ou les demandes urgentes

Des agents dans chaque administration sont mobilisés pour répondre aux urgences sociales.



Administration +

Comment ça marche ?

keyboard_arrow_down

Administration +

Pourquoi l'utiliser ?

keyboard_arrow_down

1

Sur Administration+, vous pouvez faire intervenir plusieurs administrations sur une demande.

2

Sur Administration+, vous échangez ensemble sur un fil de discussion dédié.

3

Sur Administration+, vous gardez une trace des échanges tant que la demande est en cours.

4

Sur A+ vous êtes en conformité par rapport à la confidentialité des données.

5

Les demandes sont habituellement résolues sous 4 jours.

6

L’équipe d'Administration+ est disponible pour vous aider.

info.name: XSS-Protection Header - Cross-Site Scripting
author: joshlarsen
info.description: Setting the XSS-Protection header is deprecated. Setting the header to anything other than `0` can actually introduce an XSS vulnerability.

request:
GET / HTTP/1.1
Host: aplus.beta.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Accept-Encoding: gzip
response:

author: socketz

info.description: This template searches for missing HTTP security headers. The impact of these missing headers can vary.

request:
GET / HTTP/1.1
Host: aplus.beta.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Accept-Encoding: gzip
response:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK Connection: close Content-Length: 19893 Content-Security-Policy: img-src 'self' data: stats.data.gouv.fr; connect-src 'self' https://stats.data.gouv.fr; form-action 'self'; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' stats.data.gouv.fr; frame-src 'self' *.aplus.beta.gouv.fr https://www.dailymotion.com; object-src 'none'; default-src 'none'; base-uri 'none'; script-src 'self' stats.data.gouv.fr; font-src 'self'; frame-ancestors 'self' Content-Type: text/html; charset=UTF-8 Date: Sun, 05 Nov 2023 02:13:35 GMT Referrer-Policy: origin-when-cross-origin, strict-origin-when-cross-origin Set-Cookie: PLAY_SESSION=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJkYXRhIjp7ImNzcmZUb2tlbiI6Ijc5NzEzYjQwNDQ0YmEzZTUyMzY3YjhhNTg3ZGVlMWU2YjkyNjJjNzItMTY5OTE1MDQxNTI4MC0xMjk2MTk3NjkxNWUxNzY2MDUyYWUyMzMifSwiZXhwIjoxNzAxNzQyNDE1LCJuYmYiOjE2OTkxNTA0MTUsImlhdCI6MTY5OTE1MDQxNX0.ko6mHP2MbpSGk_IVxzpyZy8u2asW6XJKqkMsGB5GkDw; Max-Age=2592000; Expires=Tue, 05 Dec 2023 02:13:35 GMT; SameSite=Lax; Path=/; Secure; HTTPOnly Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=15724800; includeSubDomains X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff X-Frame-Options: DENY X-Permitted-Cross-Domain-Policies: master-only X-Xss-Protection: 1; mode=block Administration+

FAQ open_in_new Nous contacter
Le service qui permet de résoudre les blocages administratifs complexes ou urgents

Connectez-vous




Vous rencontrez des difficultés à vous connecter ?

Contactez-nous, notre équipe est disponible pour vous renseigner et vous aider.

email support@aplus.beta.gouv.fr

Administration +

Qu'est-ce que c'est ?

keyboard_arrow_down

Objectif : coopérer pour résoudre les blocages complexes ou les demandes urgentes

Des agents dans chaque administration sont mobilisés pour répondre aux urgences sociales.



Administration +

Comment ça marche ?

keyboard_arrow_down

Administration +

Pourquoi l'utiliser ?

keyboard_arrow_down

1

Sur Administration+, vous pouvez faire intervenir plusieurs administrations sur une demande.

2

Sur Administration+, vous échangez ensemble sur un fil de discussion dédié.

3

Sur Administration+, vous gardez une trace des échanges tant que la demande est en cours.

4

Sur A+ vous êtes en conformité par rapport à la confidentialité des données.

5

Les demandes sont habituellement résolues sous 4 jours.

6

L’équipe d'Administration+ est disponible pour vous aider.

info.name: WAF Detection
author: dwisiswant0
lu4nx
info.description: A web application firewall was detected.

request:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: aplus.beta.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Content-Length: 27
Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded
Accept-Encoding: gzip

_=<script>alert(1)</script>
curl-command: curl -X 'POST' -d '_=<script>alert(1)</script>' -H 'Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded' -H 'Host: aplus.beta.gouv.fr' -H 'User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)' 'https://aplus.beta.gouv.fr/'

info.name: Detect SSL Certificate Issuer
author: lingtren
info.description: Extract the issuer's organization from the target's certificate. Issuers are entities which sign and distribute certificates.

info.name: SSL DNS Names
author: pdteam
info.description: Extract the Subject Alternative Name (SAN) from the target's certificate. SAN facilitates the usage of additional hostnames with the same certificate.

info.name: TLS Version - Detect
author: pdteam
pussycat0x
info.description:
TLS version detection is a security process used to determine the version of the Transport Layer Security (TLS) protocol used by a computer or server.
It is important to detect the TLS version in order to ensure secure communication between two computers or servers.

info.name: TLS Version - Detect
